article_title: The world reacts to Jarryd Hayne's announcement in 49ers squad
article_text:
The NFL and NRL have taken to Twitter to sing Jarryd Hayne's praises on his breaking into the San Francisco 49ers.

Social media exploded with news the Hayne Plane had made the NFL franchise's 53-member squad.

Against the odds: Jarryd Hayne was up against it from the start. Photo: Getty Images

The man himself tweeted of his nerves minutes before the announcement and then delivered the news many had hoped for.

Advertisement

I'll know my future in 13 minute. First time I'm a little nerves — jarryd hayne (@jarrydhayne_1) September 5, 2015

IT ALWAYS WORKS OUT! I thank GOD for WHAT HE has done and going to do on this incredible journey!! I'm on the 53 MAN ROSTER FOR THE #49ers. — jarryd hayne (@jarrydhayne_1) September 5, 2015

He was welcomed with open arms by the NFL.

And by the 49ers.

Wake up 🇦🇺! @jarrydhayne_1 has made the #49ers 53-man roster. pic.twitter.com/3N0EiXhwFA — San Francisco 49ers (@49ers) September 5, 2015

NRL figures were quick to sing Hayne's praises:

Welcome to the NFL @jarrydhayne_1. Followed your dream and proved all the doubters wrong. One of the… https://t.co/kPYlg7IpM9 — robbie farah (@robbiefarah) September 6, 2015

And from his former Parramatta teammates:

Champ, we couldn't be prouder! Keep dreaming big Haynesy #blueandgold #JH38 https://t.co/aQVXEtMbmU — Parramatta Eels (@TheParraEels) September 5, 2015

Great day for Aussie sport. Great inspiration for people that want to chase dreams. Great start to a new journey. Great work @jarrydhayne_1. — Tim Mannah (@tim_mannah) September 5, 2015

AAP
